name: pTokens BTC [OLD]
public_notice: pTokens BTC has recently migrated from their old contract to a new one. Visit this post for more information and visit the new token page here.
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: pBTC is a wrapped Bitcoin launched by pNetwork. Unlike wBTC and HBTC, where the BTC backing the tokens are custodied under a centralized entity, the BTC backing pBTC is custodied under a smart contract, making it a more decentralized option.
